--- xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:

> Perceptor/Hydras:
> 
> Perceptor smiled when he pick up Hot rod's signal leaving the city 
> and send a comlink to Hydras. After that he send another signal; it 
> was around, but still far, of the trap's 
> 
> Hydras looked to his bots and said "Beware Rodimus is close, remain 
> hidden until I call you..."

The large purple and black lion that is Myrmidon is still laying on 
high rocky outcropping, covered not only in the surrounding shadows and
foliage, but also the power of his own cloaking shields. 

He emited a sound somewhere between a growl and a purr but otherwise
remained silent as he also kept a look out. With a thought he adjusted
his visual, olfactory and auditory sensors to optimum sensativity as he
waited for thier prey to show itself. Behind him his tail fliped ever
so slightly as he waited silently. 

Preston
(Myrmidon)
